title: Until Dawn is Coming to PS5? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.24.24
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

Blessing and Tim talk about Until Dawn coming to PS5, State of Play rumors, and more Palworld talk.
